author: ly615
body:
This PR includes the update of L1T collections in Run II  in order to fill the L1TriggerVsGen histograms.  The change is mostly done in Validation/L1T package, which is an important package for L1T RelVal. A corresponding L1T_postProcessor python script is created in Validation/Configuration to compute the L1T efficiencies w.r.t Gen objects.  
The PR has been tested on RelVal_Ztautau sample,  no problem shows up.
title: [91X] L1T Validation Module with Stage2 updates
